title: Enertia Consulting Group LLC
cleaned_text: Founded in February 2010, ENERTIA CONSULTING GROUP is an integrated civil engineering company that provides land and infrastructure planning and engineering, traditional and new energy development support, and construction management services. Privately held and steadily growing, we serve private and public clients locally in the Rocky Mountain Region, Idaho, Texas and in the Northeast United States. Our areas of expertise include: land planning and engineering; water distribution and wastewater collection system design; site/civil design; roadway design; low impact development; environmental compliance and permitting; and construction administration and management. Our professional staff includes experienced project managers, civil engineers and construction managers. We lead by example and hold ourselves to the utmost level of ethical behavior in all that we do.
